name: Vampiric Curse
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target creature you can see within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or have their skin changed to resemble a vampire's own skin. When exposed to direct sunlight, the creature immediately takes 2d10 radiant damage, increasing by 1d10 for each consecutive turn they end their turn in sunlight. They have disadvantage on attack rolls while in the sunlight.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns. On a success, the spell ends.
empower: Grants vulnerability to radiant damage from other sources of radiant damage other than this spell.
